product.name: Miseno MNO-NA400 Oval 11" Copper Drop-In or Undermount Bathroom Sink - Hand-Hammered Antique Copper
product.description: Product Features: Miseno sinks are constructed of the finest hand-hammered copper offering unrivaled durability while still providing a stylish upgrade to any home Small oval undermount or drop-in copper bath sink with antique finish provides the perfect balance of functionality and aesthetic appeal Fixture is fully covered under warranty by Miseno for 1-year after installation Dual mount installation options: drop-in or undermount Center drain location provides optimal draining capability Constructed of 18 gauge hand-hammered copper Product Specifications: Overall Height: 4-1/2" (the bottom of the sink to the top of the rim)) Overall Width: 11" (the back outer rim to the front outer rim) Overall Length: 15" (the left outer rim to the right outer rim) Basin Width: 9" (the back inner rim to the front inner rim) Basin Length: 13" (the left inner rim to the right inner rim) Basin Depth: 4-1/2" (center of basin to the rim) Installation Type: Drop-in or undermount Drain Outlet Connection: 1-1/12" (standard - fitting most every drain assembly)
product.bullet_points:
• Miseno sinks are constructed of the finest hand-hammered copper offering unrivaled durability while still providing a stylish upgrade to any home
• Small oval undermount or drop-in copper bath sink with antique finish provides the perfect balance of functionality and aesthetic appeal
• Fixture is fully covered under warranty by Miseno for 1-year after installation
• Dual mount installation options: drop-in or undermount
• Center drain location provides optimal draining capability
